comment: Non-closure: if one vector belongs to a subspace but another does not, their sum does not belong. Useful for obtaining a new vector not in a subspace. TODO: notice similarity to ~ lspindp3 . Can it be used along with ~ lspsnne1 , ~ lspsnne2 to shorten this proof? (Contributed by NM, 14-May-2015.)
